summary:
The piano is a popular musical instrument with 88 keys that make sound when you press them. There are two main types: grand pianos, which have a better sound and are used by professional pianists, and upright pianos, which are smaller and more common in homes.

When you play a key, small hammers hit the strings, creating vibrations that become sound. Pedals at the bottom allow you to hold notes longer, creating beautiful music. The piano is used in many kinds of music and is very popular in the Western world.
title: Piano
